title: How's this build on evelynn?

replies.body:
Take out Nashor's/Wit's End and get Spirit Visage.

That's all the damage you need (oh, and pick up Chilling Smite).
Thanks for the input. That's actually really effective with spell vamp.

I wouldn't always count out red smite though.

For example, if the enemy has a duelist that often tried to stop your flank, red smite can be a huge help in handling them.
It is also great vs. burst.

One more, if they have little to no hard cc, try swifties over mercs, as the ability to mitigate slows while your w is on cooldown is very helpful
No problem. I would also drop out Iceborn in return for Sunfire/Randuin's/Dead Man's Plate. You NEED health to help you until your sustain kicks in.

Why Spirit Visage on Eve?
Also AP Eve isn't squishy if you go Rylai's.

my typical core eve build is ap, but she is tanky/ap...try this

{{item:1402}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}}  and either {{item:3001}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3143}} depending on the situation

also i tend to start with {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}  instead of flash. makes for easy early game snowballing

i never feel too squishy going rylai/deadmans. runic echos gives her enough burst for quite a bit of the game to where i get a giant's belt after boots. rageblade is ok, but i feel like with eve's ult being her only CC, its hard to keep people in AA range for a long time without rylai's and spamming Q. Same thing goes for gunblade. i don't see her being able to really use the life steal too much tbh. However i could be wrong, i haven't played too much AD eve lately. ap eve is just more my playstyle. i'll have to try out some of these AD builds. let me know if you try this one out and what you think :P

i use this build on evelynn because im disgusting

I find that in order to win with eve, you have to be as disgusting as possible so no problem. But how do you find this build? (I'd probably replace dusk blade with spirit visage).
i have very limited experience with eve but full ad eve makes her a little harder to kill and the duskblade really helps with deleting squishies
tell me if its awful so i can stop using it

Evelynn is one of those champions where you could show me a loose assembly of 6 items and I would be like "yeah, that looks like an Evelynn build". Its so hard to build her wrong because she works with EVERYTHING

And at the same time she works extremely well with nothing ._.
Jack of all trades. Master of none.

Tried something similar to this with Stalker's/Devourer, Guinsoo's, Gunblade, mercs/swifties with alacrity/furor, then visage with situational armor.

Let me just say, your abilities do a ton of damage and your autos are not useles for once which is great.

For masteries, I went 12/18/0
 
Ferocity
Tier 1 AS
Tier 2 double edged
Tier 3 lifesteal/spellvamp
Tier 4 preferecne

Cunning
Tier 1 savagery
Tier 2 either assassin or the buff one
Tier 3 preference
Tier 4 DG
Tier 5 pen
Tier 6 thunderlords

I guess you could go 6/18/6 for more tankiness early but it's up to you

With this build I prefer fervor of battle over thunderlords. Since this build is all about out-healing the damage you're receiving, I think (tier 4) perseverance from the resolve tree would be a better choice. it also gives you the option for EVEN MORE lifesteal from runic armor (as if you didn't already have enough).

I mean really, her kit very naturally synergizes with the guinsoo/gunblade combo, so you can't go wrong. Beyond those items, you need to be tanky to keep in the fray. Spirit visage works incredibly well due to the healing nature of the build, and iceborn provides the armor and cdr that the build needs in addition to sheen effects being really good on eve due to easy procs. Though you could switch it out for deadman or some other armor item if you really need more defense.

The boots could honestly be switched to any boots that fit the situation (mobi boots being a very good choice for Jungling).

Build works perfect.
